metadata.name: Various Stuff Mod
metadata.description:
Hello! This is my first mod ever! It's a very small one, but I really hope you all like it!!!
This mod adds:
-7 New items -1 New trinket (LANCER) -A few new room until depths -And a new playable Character with their tainted! (Both Characters are based of my partner oc's! You can find him on twitter as @verdejunkrat on twitter and @verdejunkrat.bsky.social on BlueSky!)
I want to add more content on the future, so, any suggestion or critism about the mod is really appreciated!!!
